title: NLFS: 1888 The Umpires Lot Not a Happy One - Bufford A&P Baking Powder
author: Rad_Hazard

posts.post_title: NLFS: 1888 The Umpires Lot Not a Happy One - Bufford A&P Baking Powder
posts.post_content:
Looking to sell or trade this oversized (OJ shown for scale) 1888 The Umpires Lot Not a Happy One - Bufford A&P Baking Powder card.

I picked it up recently and didn't realize it was this large. I don't have a great spot for it so I'm opening it up to trade or sale.

CARD IS SOLD

Would also trade for/towards other smaller size 19th century cards, T210 Lave Cross, T209 Lave Cross, 19th Century T205/T206er's.

Thanks,

Jeremy
